projects.description: LangLab is a browser-based integrated development environment (IDE) that supports multiple programming languages, allowing real-time code execution directly in the browser. The platform also includes features for clipboard operations and code file downloads

DateNight is a mobile application enhances user experience by offering personalized date planning suggestions and integrating third-party services such as recommending top local restaurants and shopping options.
Showcases full-stack development expertise through integrated front-end and back-end projects, featuring robust data management, cloud deployment, and version control

Split Bill is a web-based application for managing shared expenses among family and friends. The interface centralizes bill management, enabling users to efficiently add, edit, delete, and settle group expenses, with the goal of streamlining and clarifying financial contribution
